concept.title: Using an HDFS User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the Hadoop FS destination to use an HDFS user to write data to HDFS.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS destinationusing an HDFS user to write to HadoopBy default, the uses the user account who started it to connect to external systems. When using Kerberos, the uses the Kerberos principal. Make sure updates to this topic go into the origin version of this file. And possibly the HBase version?

To use an HDFS user to connect to HDFS, perform the following tasks:
On HDFS, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HDFS user.
For more information, see the HDFS documentation.
In the Hadoop FS destination, enter the HDFS user name.
